code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{user,requiredRole,children}=_ref;if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});}if(requiredRole==='admin'){if(user.userRole!=='admin'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:user.userRole==='manager'?'/manager':'/employee',replace:true});}}else if(requiredRole==='manager'){if(user.userRole!=='admin'&&user.userRole!=='manager'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/employee",replace:true});}}else if(requiredRole==='employee'){if(user.userRole==='admin'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/admin",replace:true});}else if(user.userRole==='manager'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/manager",replace:true});}}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
